description: Number of convex polygons of length 2n on square lattice whose leftmost bottom vertex is strictly to the left of the rightmost top vertex.
references: M.-P. Delest and G. Viennot, Algebraic languages and polyominoes enumeration, Theoretical Computer Sci., 34 (1984), 169-206.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
extensions: Better description from Markus Voege (voege(AT)blagny.inria.fr), Nov 28 2003
